Name: The Shattered Blade
About the game: ( 6/10/2019 According to feedbacks, this game seems to be much too hard, and in several days I'll reduce the difficulties. ) The Shattered Blade is a dash based platformer. In this game you will control a very fast character,fly like thunder,and enjoy the feeling of challenge yourself. Use your sword to dash and attack in this deadly neon world! GameFeature 1.Neon,Geometry Graphics. 2.Super strong,instant feedback. 3.Everything is very fast but controllable. 4.Every level is brand new experience!New skills,new enemies,new difficulties,etc. 5.Exciting music made by “弹跳的大球” and '冷鱼'. 6.Every Enemies and Traps is made to be very interactive,scary and deadly. 7.Level Editor!(in the future.)
